name: Wrecker
description:
Stressed out? Need to vent? Wanna blow shit up?

We can't promise that Wrecker will solve all of your problems, but we guarantee mayhem and destruction.


Wrecker is an 2D arcade game set in space. In it you will fight off an endless horde of aliens in waves using your special issue high powered missile turret.

There are multiple enemy types to watch out for and they each have their own individual behaviors to keep you on your toes.

Every time you kill an enemy you get a little metal scrap back from their ship that you can use to purchase a few items to help you survive.

How long can you survive?
